start_date.name: start_date
start_date.description: Select the start date of the simulation

end_date.name: end_date
end_date.description: Select the end date of the simulation

event.name: post
event.description: End of daily simulation time step

maxtmodifier.description: Change in temperature in degrees celsius

mintmodifier.description: Change in temperature in degrees celsius

rule.name: Sow using a variable rule
rule.condition:
if (paddock_is_fallow() = 1) then if (date_within('[date1], [date2]') = 1) then surface_moist = (sw(1) - ll15(1)) / (dul(1)- ll15(1)) if ((esw >= [esw_amount] AND (surface_moist <= [surface_up] and surface_moist >= [surface_low])) OR ('[must_sow]' = 'yes' AND today = date('[date2]'))) THEN [crop] sow plants =[density], sowing_depth = [depth], cultivar = [cultivar], row_spacing = [row_spacing]
endif endif endif

property.name: esw_amount
property.description: Enter minimum allowable available soil water (mm) :

property.name: surface_low
property.description: Enter lowest allowable fasw in top layer (0-1) :

property.name: surface_up
property.description: Enter upper allowable fasw in top layer (0-1) :

property.name: crop
property.description: Enter name of crop to sow :

rule.name: Sow on a fixed date
rule.condition: if (paddock_is_fallow() = 1 and clock.today = date('[date]')) then [crop] sow plants =[density], sowing_depth = [depth], cultivar = [cultivar], row_spacing = [row_spacing] endif

property.name: crop
property.description: Enter name of crop to sow :

rule.name: SUGAR management
rule.condition:
! ----------------------------------------------------------------- ! Book keeping to round days to integer values plantlen = nearest_int(plantlen) ratoonlen = nearest_int(ratoonlen)
! Initialise and set a time counter for entire run dah = 0
if (sugar.crop_status = 'alive') then dah = 0
! Set harvest dates for each crop phase if (sugar.das = [plantlen] and ratoon_no = 0) or (sugar.das = [ratoonlen] and ratoon_no > 0) then
sugar harvest
if (ratoon_no = [NoRatoons] + 1) then ! plough the crop out sugar kill_crop sugar end_crop
else ! Set stalk density sugar.plants = [ratoon_stalks] endif else ! We have not reached the harvest date for this ratoon. endif
elseif (sugar.crop_status = 'dead') then sugar harvest sugar end_crop
elseif (sugar.crop_status = 'out') and (today = date('[planting_day]') then sugar sow plants = 10 (), cultivar = [variety], sowing_depth = [sowing_depth] sugar.plants = [plant_stalks] dah = 0
else dah = dah + 1 endif

property.name: crop
property.description: Enter name of crop to sow :

property.name: plantlen
property.description: Duration of a plant crop (days) (30.5 days/month) :

property.name: ratoonlen
property.description: Duration of a ratoon crop (days) (30.5 days/month) :

rule.name: Harvesting rule
rule.condition: if [crop].stage_name = 'harvest_ripe' or [crop].plant_status = 'dead' then [crop] harvest [crop] end_crop endif

property.name: crop
property.description: Enter name of crop to harvest when ripe :

property.name: modulename
property.description: On which module should the event come from :

property.name: eventname
property.description: On which event should fertiliser be applied :

property.name: fertmodule
property.description: Module used to apply the fertiliser :

property.name: fert_amount_sow
property.description: Amount of starter fertiliser at sowing (kg/ha) :

property.name: fert_type_sow
property.listvalues: NO3_N, NH4_N, NH4NO3, urea_N, urea_no3, urea

rule.name: Fertilise on fixed date
rule.condition: if (today = date('[fert_date]') then N_topsoil = no3(1) + nh4(1) + no3(2) + nh4(2) if (N_topsoil < [fert_criteria]) then [fertmodule] apply amount = [fert_amount] (kg/ha), depth = 50 (mm), type = [fert_type] () endif endif

property.name: fert_criteria
property.description: Don't add fertiliser if N in top 2 layers exceeds (kg/ha) :

property.name: fertmodule
property.description: Module used to apply the fertiliser :

property.name: fert_amount
property.description: Amount of starter fertiliser at sowing (kg/ha) :

property.name: fert_type
property.listvalues: NO3_N, NH4_N, NH4NO3, urea_N, urea_no3, urea

rule.name: Fertilise on fixed date - top up
rule.condition: if (today = date('[fert_date]') then N_deficit = $fert_criteria - (no3(1) + nh4(1) + no3(2) + nh4(2) + no3(3) + nh4(3)) '[fertmodule]' apply amount = N_deficit (kg/ha), depth = 50 (mm), type = [fert_type] () endif

property.name: fert_criteria
property.description: Amount of N required in top 3 layers (kg/ha) :

property.name: fertmodule
property.description: Module used to apply the fertiliser :

property.name: fert_type
property.listvalues: NO3_N, NH4_N, NH4NO3, urea_N, urea_no3, urea

property.name: modulename
property.description: The module the event come from :

property.name: eventname
property.description: Which event should irrigation be applied :

property.name: irrigatemodule
property.description: Module used to apply the irrigation :

rule.name: Tillage on fixed date
rule.condition: if (today = date('[tillage_date]') then if ('[tillage_type]' = 'user_defined') then '[surfaceommodule]' tillage type = [tillage_type], f_incorp = [tillage_f_incorp] (), tillage_depth = [tillage_depth] else '[surfaceommodule]' tillage type = [tillage_type] endif ready_to_till_pre_sow = 0 till_day_pre_sow = 0 endif

property.name: surfaceommodule
property.description: Module used to apply the tillage :

property.name: tillage_type
property.listvalues: user_defined, chisel, disc, planter, burn, burn_90, graze, scarifier, rip, blade, tine

property.name: tillage_f_incorp
property.description: User_defined fraction of surface residues to incorporate (0-1):

rule.name: Reset water, nitrogen and surfaceOM on fixed date
rule.condition: if (today = date('[reset_date]') then resetWater = '[resetWater]' resetNitrogen = '[resetNitrogen]' resetSurfaceOM = '[resetSurfaceOM]' if (resetWater = 'yes') then '[soilmodule] Water' reset endif if (resetNitrogen = 'yes') then '[soilmodule] Nitrogen' reset endif if (resetSurfaceOM = 'yes') then '[surfaceommodule]' reset endif endif

category.name: When should a reset be done

property.name: surfaceommodule
property.description: Name of your surface organic matter module :

property.name: asw_depth
property.description: Depth to which ASW is calculated. (mm)

property.name: crit_fr_asw
property.description: Fraction of ASW below which irrigation is applied (0-1.0)

breed.name: breed
breed.listvalues: angus, ayrshire, beef shorthorn, brahman, brahman x british, brown swiss, charolais, charolais x british, charolais x friesian, charolais x holstein, chianina, dairy shorthorn, friesian, friesian x british, guernsey, hereford, holstein, holstein x british, jersey, limousin, sahiwal, simmental, south devon
